law.catch_line: Every vendor under a land installment contract shall mail or deliver a statement to the purchaser:...

text.section:
Every vendor under a land installment contract shall mail or deliver a statement to the purchaser:
When 40 percent of the original cash price has been paid; and
Annually within 30 days of January 1; or
On demand of the purchaser no more than twice a year.

The statement shall show:
The total amount paid for any ground rent, insurance, taxes, and any other periodic charge;
The amount credited to principal and interest; and
The balance due.
